summary: This is an email chain regarding the provision of a laptop to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell (Reg. No. 02879-509) at a Bureau of Prisons facility. The document is a forwarded message with multiple recipients from Department of Justice email addresses, indicating administrative coordination for Maxwell's legal or personal needs while incarcerated.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email is the provision of a laptop for her while she is incarcerated under registration number 02879-509.

events.title: Email regarding laptop for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: An email is sent discussing the provision of a laptop to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 17, 2020, concerning administrative arrangements for Ghislaine Maxwell in prison.
Ghislaine Maxwell is identified by her Bureau of Prisons registration number: 02879-509.
The email involves multiple Department of Justice (DOJ) and Bureau of Prisons (BOP) email addresses, indicating official coordination.
The subject matter is the provision of a laptop to Maxwell, likely for legal or communication purposes while incarcerated.
